node.title: Welcome to Ghost
node.description:
Welcome, it's great to have you here.
We know that first impressions are important, so we've populated your new site with some initial getting started posts that will help you get familiar with everything in no time.

node.title: Writing posts with Ghost ✍️
node.description: Discover familiar formatting options in a functional toolbar and the ability to add dynamic content seamlessly.

node.title: Publishing options
node.description: The Ghost editor post settings menu has everything you need to fully optimise and distribute your content effectively.

node.title: Managing admin settings
node.description: There are a couple of things to do next while you're getting set up: making your site private and inviting your team.

node.title: Organising your content
node.description: Ghost has a flexible organisational taxonomy called tags and the ability to create custom site structures using dynamic routes.

node.title: Apps & integrations
node.description: Work with all your favourite apps and tools or create your own custom integrations using the Ghost API.

node.title: Creating a custom theme
node.description: Ghost comes with a beautiful default theme designed for publishers which can easily be adapted for most purposes, or you can build a custom theme to suit your needs.
